BatteryV3¶

class lms2.electric.batteries.BatteryV3(*args, voc_rule=None, method='linear', **kwargs)[source]¶

Bilinear battery Model.

This battery is limited in power, variation of power, state of charge and energy. One can fix initial and final state of charge. Efficiency for charge and discharge are considered. It exposes one power port using source convention.

Type

Documentation

Var

Absolute value of variable dp

Var

Var

_build_action

BuildAction

Hack for the last index of the expression using index and time.

This function is used to compute power profile during absorption phase and floating phase.
